News.headline: Match Preview: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Aldershot Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Aldershot Town tomorrow
News.description:
A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Aldershot Town tomorrow
The Daggers make the trip to Aldershot tomorrow and will be looking to get back to winning ways after their 2-1 away defeat to Barrow AFC on Saturday. 

Aldershot will be looking for their second win on the bounce after beating Sutton United 2-0 at home on Saturday. Aldershot Town are currently seventh in the table and are three points outside the play-offs and five points behind the Daggers going into the game.

Previous 5 Results 

Daggers
Barrow 2-1 Daggers
Daggers 2-1 Forest Green 
Gateshead 1-0 Daggers 
Daggers 1-2 Maidstone 
Daggers 2-1 Bromley 
   
Aldershot
Aldershot 2-0 Sutton
Guiseley 1-0 Aldershot
Aldershot 0-0 Lincoln
Eastleigh 1-1 Aldershot
Aldershot 4-0 Bromley

Team News
Matt Robinson and Curtley Williams will be looking at returning to the squad following their injuries. Luke Howell and Luke Guttridge are both to set to miss out. Elliot Romain will be looking for his first start after coming on a substitute against Barrow on Saturday. 
 
Previous Meetings
The Daggers last met Aldershot back in October when the Daggers run out 1-0 winners thanks to a goal from Corey Whitely. 

Fixtures
There is eleven fixtures in the Vanarama National League on Tuesday with all 7:45pm KO’s. 

Aldershot v Daggers
Barrow v Wrexham
Boreham Wood v Lincoln
Braintree v Woking
Chester v Macclesfield
Forest Green v Solihull Moors
Gateshead v Guiseley
Maidstone v Sutton
North Ferriby v Tranmere
Torquay v Eastleigh
York v Southport

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media:
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
